metadata.title: CVE-2021-47096 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: ALSA:rawmidi - fix the uninitalized user_pversion The user_pversion wasuninitialized for the user space file structure in the open function,because the file private structure use kmalloc for the allocation. Thekernel ALSA sequencer code clears the file structure, so no additionalfixes are required. BugLink:https://github.com/alsa-project/alsa-lib/issues/178

criterions.comment: linux package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
